tool_description: With this API, you can get information about items such as prices, get a specific seller's items and so on
name: Codester API
title: Codester API

api_list.name: Items
api_list.description: You can get item details such as description, price, author, images and so on.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codester-api.p.rapidapi.com/items/40946"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codester-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codester-api.p.rapidapi.com/items/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codester-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
